TopicTitle: My first proper SSTO that I am satisfied with.

Articles.Content:
So after reading some threads, I decided to make an SSTO based off of the design of the Nobunga Interceptor. So with me still learning about space planes, I went through 3 designs before I developed a pretty neat SSTO that I am satisfied with. Below 500m it's pretty much a jet fighter, even without the advanced reaction wheel on. I used a rapier for this design, but in the future I might swap it with two radial 48-7s engines and a turbojet.

But besides that, nice first SSTO! Looks good, although I think the canards at the front are pretty ugly... getting rid of those would improve the aesthetics a lot.
Well congratulations for not giving up. Well done!
Thanks for the feedback. I guess that makes me a hypocrite and lazy, because I thought about it but then said "NAHH" and I also tell others to google search it because it's so easy.
